name: Spartan Runner
description:
Endless runner android mobile game( also can be played on the browser) including ancient ambience.

This is the first game of mine with the 4 months of Unity experience

Hope you like it.

On web:

You can play by dragging your mouse or with arrow keys.

Fullscreen is not advised.

On mobile: 

All you gotta do is sliding your fingers through directions
